main event: A bright, saucer-shaped object was observed hovering approximately 150 feet above the ground in Celina, Ohio, on June 30, 1964.
interesting points: The object was round, white, and luminous., It remained in one position for 15 minutes before disappearing rapidly., The observation was made by two skilled witnesses who could not identify it., A detailed report from a witness described the object as metallic and spinning slowly., The object accelerated straight up at a high rate of speed and disappeared in seconds.
